circumstances: On final approach to Nadi Airport runway 21, at an altitude of 500 feet, the right flap jammed in a 35° angle while the left one was down at 60°. This caused the aircraft to roll to the left and to crashed short of runway. Both pilots and nine passengers were killed while three others were seriously injured.
probable_cause: Unsecured non-standard flap attachment pin migrated upward and lodged in a lightening hole.
